game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR 407 ‘New ICE 3’ EMU Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step aboard and get up to speed in Velaro family’s latest and greatest iteration, the authentically crafted DB BR 407 ‘New ICE 3’ delivers a “next level” high-speed experience to Train Simulator.
